website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for customers who want a grooming table built exclusively for smaller dogs and pets.
pros: Buyers appreciate the unique shape of the table
Nonslip table mat is extremely easy to clean
Rubber feet offered for table traction
Table can be placed and used on any flat surface
cons: A few tables arrived without the grooming arm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner trying to do my own grooming at home. This table is a lifesaver! My little guy does not like to be groomed and won’t sit still! It stresses him out so much! I ordered this table and it went so much smoother. He was much calmer and I was able to take my time, causing less stress on both of us. It rotates so you aren’t breaking your back trying to get at all of the angles. It is small and portable so it doesn’t take up a lot of room and is easy to store away. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Slashier

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, solidly made and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeded my expectations! Great quality, solidly made and easy to assemble. I brush out my Havanese daily, so this table makes things so much easier. He's a bit big for it, but still works fine. I got the table while visiting my Mom who has a Coton. He hates to be brushed, but when he saw my boy getting attention he willing let me put him on and get a test brush. It's been three days, and the both get excited when the table comes out. I've even been able to come out the Coton's gavmve - something he never let us do. Love this table!
customer_reviews.author: pbgvluv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent! Very sturdy. I use this every single day to brush out my dog. It made blow drying her a million times easier. I have a 12 lb. poodle and she just fits on it. I highly recommend this item to anyone that has a dog that needs a lot of grooming.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Unbroken

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Investment !!!!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This Is a great investment. I ordered with the haunch support and so happy I did. Was grooming with my 8 month old miniature poodle puppy on my lap and though she enjoys her daily hair care I did a lot of finagling I got her done. Now, it’s just popping her on the table, attaching the head and haunch supports in place and we’re done perfectly in soooo much less time. The unit took virtually no time to assemble, a plus, and I’m delighted with the price, convenience and lovely purple color! Don’t know how I got by without it!
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my small Yorkies.
customer_reviews.text: I should of read 1 - 2 star reviews first before I purchased it. My 2 dogs are 7&8 lb Yorkies and their back feet stepped out many times while I tried to groom them. Way too small for even for small dogs. Maybe this one is good for x small dogs (and stay still.) Didn't work for my fur babies. Quality is pretty good and wish was bigger----
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Molly

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! My 1 year old Shih Tzu is about 11 lbs. and has given me such a hard time about hair cuts since we got him at 4 months old - chewing on the scissors, my hand, his comb...I had to let him chew the handle of his brush to cut his hair. Finally, he started ignoring the brush and only focused on my hand and the scissors, so I quit cutting his hair about 2 months ago. This was the first time I've been able to cut his hair with him standing still...thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Payne

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 yorkies that are under 5 lbs. I wanted something that I could easily store when not in use. A big plus for me was that it turned. It also cleans up very well. It says that it is a grooming "table," however, I would not consider this a table. It is just inches high so it would need to be put on top of a table or kitchen bar. I put it on a folding table that raises to bar height. **Please don't use the leash around your pets neck. I put around their chest/behind their front legs so that it won't choak them**
customer_reviews.author: arlloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for clipping small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Works great especially when you replace single harness with front and rear harness. My small pooch was all over the place before I got this table. Now when she turns to get away I just turn the table and continue clipping. Cuts my clipping time down a lot, when I don't have to chase her fight to get her to stand so I can clip her. The only negative was that the package was delivered to my barn on the hill, not the house. I didn't find it for 2 days as it was covered with snow. I only found it by accident while cleaning the drive with the snow blower.
customer_reviews.author: Chico

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 pound Pomeranian (she is 9 yo) and as you can image, she is hard to groom. I purchased this and cannot imagine why I didn't think of this before. I purchased an extra strap to go around the waist as well as the one that comes for the neck hoop. The leash is a little difficult to maneuver that's why I gave it a 3 star. The table makes it so much easier to blow dry and brush her. Can't even imagine how I managed without this in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Just a tsp

customer_reviews.title: Great idea to get your Pup to stay put for grooming
customer_reviews.text: My wife was skeptical that we needed another "dog thing." But turned out she agreed this was a super purchase. While the product is all that it says to be, the winning feature is our dog now knows what is about to happen when she gets put on the grooming table. While she may still not like grooming, she will now grudgingly stay put. And this is a BIG thing,
customer_reviews.author: L. McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially if you have wrist issues!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my 5 lb. Yorkie. Assembled in under a minute. Used immediately. Watched a YouTube video and was on my way. She didn't turn out half bad for my first try! This really helped with my wrist issues, being able to turn her on the table.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: I set a towel on the base so the dogs felt like they were safe and sure footed
customer_reviews.text: Worked so well. I may be new to dog grooming but this helped immensely. I first groomed our confident dog and then the other one saw there wasn't anything to be afraid of. I set a towel on the base so the dogs felt like they were safe and sure footed. This will help me save lots of money as I won't have to take them to the groomers at $70 per visit for both dogs. Update: I used this for the first time to clip my doggies toe nails and it made all the difference! While on the stand with the haunch harness it made the dogs calm and secure. I clipped the nails without trouble.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Good size for 12 lb. Shih Tzu.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for home grooming. The surface is not slippery, so he likes standing on it. I put it up on my kitchen table, which *is* slippery, and he prefers to stay on the grooming table. Turning the table is a nice feature, but he likes to look at me, so he tends to keep turning too, so he doesn't lose sight of me. Trimming his tail and hind quarters is still a challenge..... :-)
customer_reviews.author: tinyNorman

customer_reviews.title: Missing the grooming arm? Really?
customer_reviews.text: The grooming table just arrived and was missing the grooming arm. That's 1/3 of the product. I don't normally write negative reviews for something like this, but there is no website or phone number on their less-than-helpful instruction sheet, which is always a red flag. Tops Pet Products/Master Equipment: I would have called you first, but you made that impossible. One other small thing: This product requires screwing the arm to the table. It's not a clamp. That's useful information for anyone with arthritis or a hand injury.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Janners

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Home Grooming
customer_reviews.text: this was a great purchase...i struggled to groom my poodle at home and then found this and now have been able to groom him much easier....it doesn't take up that much room which is great because i have a small condo...i will never again try to attempt grooming without this handy table, i put it up on my dining table and my poodle is at a great height to not hurt my back and for him to stand still...otherwise he moved around too much or sat down making it impossible to groom him.
customer_reviews.author: beachbum73

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy,  Spins,  nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand. The best part is you can rotate the base to move your dog from side to side. No more wrestling to move her body to get a consistent cut. Sturdy so no worry of falling apart while dog is hooked up. For small dogs this is a perfect accessory for grooming. My dog is only 8 pounds but this will definitely hold larger weights with no problem. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: A England

customer_reviews.title: The "Lazy Susan" style turn table mini dog grooming ensemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cute little "Lazy Susan" style turntable small dog grooming table top so I could save oodles of $ by grooming my Bichon Frise myself. She was taught very well by the previous owner who was a breeder and shower - so from the very first day "Lilibelle" could be groomed, she knew how to stand still perfectly with the hang-man's loop around her neck! No problems - she is a great little dog. BUT, if you have an untrained dog who is nervous, it might be a better bet to buy the big table. This one is tiny, but it works well with a tiny and well trained non-nervous dog.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works like a gem!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to grooming my Yorkie puppy and 4 y/o Morkie. I can put this anywhere (kitchen table, counter, etc). I have a bad back and this works well. Swiveling my dogs is so much easier then picking them up and moving them too! I haven't figured out how the neck harness works, though??? and not sure if it is height adjustable, even though the rod is...if someone can reply and help me out, that'd be great!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Grooming stand
customer_reviews.text: I really like this grooming stand. It's a little smaller than I expected but works pretty good for my two Shih Tzu's. My 12 lb boy is almost to big and my 9 lb puppy is perfect, just to give you a idea. It's nice the table spins and helps you get to the other side of the dog with out having to move. I am very satisfied with the purchase and the cost of the table. It is very sturdy and made well. Even the arm is sturdy and adjusts. I did purchase a different harness that holds their head and their little body. That was a great investment as well.
customer_reviews.author: JrsGirl88

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, easy to use pet grooming table
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! My Maltese went to a groomer for the first three years of her life. I've been grooming her at home for 9 years now and struggling with her each time I cut her hair. I did not look forward to the monthly ORDEAL. I finally bought this. How amazing! She was so well behaved that we enjoyed the time together. I'd recommend this for any pet parent that has a dog that was used to professional grooming, as this is comparable to what they use or for a puppy as you can get a puppy used to it right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: She was great for the groomer but not for me
customer_reviews.text: This table was just what I needed for my puppy that would not hold still for brushing. She was great for the groomer but not for me. As soon as I put her on it she knew to behave. So happy. Product was as advertised and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Makes grooming a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: I have used this twice now. I placed it on a table so it could work standing up. I used to send my dog to the groomer but it's just so expensive. This works great for my 14 pound Morrie (Maltese and yorkie mix). I don't think he appreciates it. It makeseems the process sp much easier and keeps him in place. I can probably thank the groomer for that because he is used to being on this type of contraption. Imy glad I purchased, have had no issues with it. This is a first time purchase so I don't have any comparisons.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but to small even for the smallest dog.
customer_reviews.author: duckdog7d

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not oerfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my two Yorkies who are 4# and 7#. Only problem is they slide all over the table top and the bar does not extent enough to actually use the haunch straps that come with it. If it came with different size bars to extend further that would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but was disappointed. It is constantly trying to spin around so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews, but was disappointed. It is constantly trying to spin around so I have to stuff a towel or something under it to try to hold it in place. The restraint is only for the neck so the dog is constantly sitting down. Bought an additional restraint so dog cannot sit down but the arm will not raise high enough so the dog can still sit down. I have papillons, one 6 1/2 lbs & two 8lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma D. Wilmer

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for home grooming of my 3 Shih-Tzu's. I'm not a professional groomer by any means, but I can use a pair of clippers and scissors on my dogs and they come out looking terrific for a home groom job. I put this table on the counter in my laundry room. As other have stated the arm could be a bit higher but I fixed that problem by putting a knot in the noose. For the money, it's a great buy. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Life made simple with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: enjoyed using this to groom my puppies it has made my life easier. i have 3 Shih-Tzu and a Chow Chow so i do my own grooming i have been slowly buying all professional grooming equipment all that's missing now is the tub but i'm in no rush for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mabull

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Durable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Small but mighty! I'm very happy with the quality of this grooming station. Just light enough to move where I want it but solid enough to hold my dogs securely. (5/6 pound Yorkies) I would say it can house a dog up to 10/15 pounds but anything higher than that you would have to increase the size. A+
customer_reviews.author: MargeryRed

customer_reviews.title: Its either missing an arm or it's a stupid design. The arm doesn't go up high enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Its either missing an arm or it's a stupid design. The arm doesn't go up high enough to make the grooming lanyard effective. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Krampe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in purple, and I love it! Put my 15 lb Havenese on it and brushing has become so easy! Wasn't sure after other reviews he would fit, but there is plenty of room on the turntable. He is about 16" long, and table is plenty big. I am now looking forward to bath time since I won't have to keep holding him still to brush him out! Great invention!
customer_reviews.author: becky b

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ideal grooming table for very tiny toy dogs! Great quality... well weighted... sturdy,,, rotates easily. My dog is a 3.5 lb Biever Terrier, and is very comfortable while being groomed. She can lie down on the round platform and rest her head on an "infant seat headrest pillow", when I groom her topknot.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 6 lb maltese. He would not let me touch him to groom or clean him eyes, but since I got this stand, he walks onto it and waits, it probably reminds him of the groomer and he seems to expect what will happen, and the treats that follow. My grooming bills have dropped considerably. It's very study. I put it on my granite countertop and stays steady during the whole process.
customer_reviews.author: D. Krishna

customer_reviews.title: shiu poo its awesome! 4 screws and it’s together It took about ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 lbs. shiu poo its awesome! 4 screws and it’s together It took about a min. to assemble. I groom her between professional groomings and she loves it no issues. Best part is you can spin her around to get to both sides and it’s heavy duty. Read some reviews about the long noose to put on the dog I just put two knots on the rope and good to go not an issue. Good quality and fair price no problem recommending for a small dog under 15 lbs. mine fits perfect on it just know the size and weight of your dog.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE

customer_reviews.title: Pet Grooming Table
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Best gift I could of ever bought myself :} I love this TABLE it made my lfe so easy. I have a 3 lb yorkie and a 6 lb maltese which took me hours to groom. This table honestly made my life easy. It's made well and so easy to set up I put it up on my counter I am Also able to cut their nails which I could of never done before. A must buy if you groom your self. I think it's A great price too
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect answer for grooming my Maltese!
customer_reviews.text: This table is light enough to be portable. I can place it on a counter which saves my back. My Maltese no longer has mats because I can use both hands to work on her. The first time it took @ 20 minutes with a de-matting comb, mat remover and a pin brush. Everyday since its been a five minute comb through and she looks fabulous! I can also clean her ears and yesterday I introduced a toothbrush. If you like having a dog with a beautiful long coat, this product is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Emmons

customer_reviews.title: well worth the monies-
customer_reviews.text: perfect for small animals- my Yorkie of 4 and a half pound- 8 month- fits great for in between pro- grooming- I am using the butt lift as well- my 14 year old Silkie 8 pds also fits great- no sliding off the table -it turns easily- -- comes assembled except muzzle gear- really two min task-I would not expect for use for heaver than 10 pds or a tall breed animal-
customer_reviews.author: GrannyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have had this a long time ago!!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for cutting hair of toy poodles. I have had poodles for years and wish I would have had this set up a long time ago. Helps me keep their head up and they do not slip around! I chose purple because they are black so easier for me to see them when cutting hair. I have a table stand dryer holder also that is very good and flexible so I can change it direction easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A must if you plan to do many cuts yourself. This table requires the dog to stay still and in one place. Combined with the two lead cable, this table has taken my grooming to a new level. My Shih Zhu hates to have me do her feet and this stopped all the chasing around the room trying to clean the hair from her pads. I had the entire dog done and mess cleaned up in less time than if I had done it my old way on a table that doesn't turn and the ability to hold her in place. Recommend this financially also. The amount spent on this table is recouped in two trips to my local groomer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Groves

customer_reviews.title: Best table ever! Stable and solid!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grooming table! 5 mins to set up. Perfect size for my little malipoo (8 lbs). Love the turn table. Calmest my puppy has ever been during grooming. Easy to set up on my counter - right height for my back. Recommed highly to anyone grooming a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: For small dogs only but is perfect for my two.
customer_reviews.text: I have not done a full groom on my boys on this yet. But I have done a couple things like trimming hair between paw pads and such. It is wonderful. My 7 lb Yorkie fits perfect. My 10 lb Maltese can be harnessed on it as well. But there is not much space left. It will still keep him harnessed.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Working great with my 8 ld
customer_reviews.text: Working great with my 8 ld. poodle. He's extremely difficult to cut nails or clean ears as he's very sensitive and moves a lot. With this table, he is not moving and calm so make my life much easier and less stressful!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Master Equipment Small Pet Grooming Table
customer_reviews.text: Great item...only thing I can use to hold my little Yorkie still to cut her hair - only way she will even let me brush her - I was so surprised that the first time I put her on it she was compliant as a kitten. All other attempts even to brush her cause her to jump and run away from me! Great product - easy to assemble the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: It certainly helps
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue Yorkie who is very hard to groom so I thought I would try this table. Although it doesn't calm him 100%, it was certainly easier to get him trimmed up and dried after his bath. Although it is small enough to use on a table, I just sit on the floor and do it. He can't run off and my hands are free for goorming.
customer_reviews.author: KellyB

customer_reviews.title: THE LEASH CAME BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: I love the table but was soooooo disappointed the restraint/leash that comes with it was busted where it attaches to the unit. I could not use it but I did not want to return the item just because of that. It is NOT easy to find one that fits this unit either, but I managed to find one small enough for me to adjust to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Tucci

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My pup almost outgrew it, but can still use it for now. A dog longer than 18" would have a hard time staying on this to be groomed. Hopefully mine has finished growing. Also bought a double loop to hold both ends. Put it up on a foldable 6" table and have plenty of room to groom. Fairly well made, the arme is a little wobbly when extended fully. It has made grooming a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: YTE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I have been looking for something like this for years. I didn't want a full table that is dedicate for this purpose. This is small enough that I can hide it easily when I don't need it. My dogs would lay on their belly every time we try to dry them and just makes it difficult This makes sure that they stay up and it is much easier for us fix them up.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Works well for small breeds.
customer_reviews.text: Works so well. I wanted something small but was a little worried about whether my dog would fit on it. I have a 15 lb Maltese. There isn't a lot of extra room but works well for him as well as my 4 lb dog. My one suggestion is that if your dog isn't very well trained you should buy an additional restraint that holds their hips up as well as their neck.
customer_reviews.author: A.  Marullo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Had damage to the purple table but not a big deal I still like the overall product but one thing is pictures do make it look a little big.. product is great for puppies and small dogs
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Happy Home Groomer!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this grooming table. It made grooming my Biewer yorkie much easier. Love the table that swivels. One thing I did differently that the photo, was preposition the turn knob to adjust the height of the arm to the outside. The lead that goes around the dogs neck kept getting caught on it, causing ti to pull tighter on my dogs' neck. Easy fix! Glad it came in purple too! Love Purple!!!
customer_reviews.author: birdlady

customer_reviews.title: Pet Grooming Table
customer_reviews.text: I placed my table next to the bathroom sink. Overall i love it, my dog is getting use to it as well. The only thing is with a 10 pound dog on it, it makes it a little hard to turn. Otherwise its great!
customer_reviews.author: marilyn01

customer_reviews.title: Not recommending !
customer_reviews.text: Too small even for a small dog, still very hard to get ur job done ....quality is good but has a lot of issues....
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful8

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Table is great quality and works awesome if you have a pretty small dog. My 7 lb dog fits perfectly and my 12 lb dog is pushing it. I love this table though, now they aren't running around the counter while I try to give them a trim!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will be used often - quality product
customer_reviews.text: If you have a toy dog that doesn't stand still for grooming get one of these. If he also likes to sit when he should be standing for grooming you may also need one of those special under tummy loops that ensures standing. I don't have one but its on my list of things we need! This table works well. The loop comes down a bit long for my dog but I just wrapped it around the arm a few times to shorten. This is basically a lazy-susan for dogs. Lightweight so easily portable too. If the arm were folding that would be an improvement I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. MatthewsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product for small dogs!!!!! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 7 lb Maltese & 7 lb Yorker. The leash type thingy that came with it was useless, so I got a cloth (Not chain) correction Type collar and a two ended snap. This set up works great. I thought this table was going to be too small and almost ordered the one that’s a bit larger, but this one is sturdier and safe. Warning as always: NEVER leave your pet unattended on this or any table.
customer_reviews.author: CPalen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but i should have gotten a larger one even for my toy dog.
customer_reviews.text: I have pekingese dogs and feel this was too small for them. They could easily step off of it with not much room to move around on it. I do like the color and how easy it was to put together and how it swivels. I just wish i got a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: drefinnej

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to my grooming table.
customer_reviews.text: I have Scottish Terriers and Westies. Just had pups. This is great. I place it on my grooming table and put the pups on it. Very stable for dogs under 12lbs. I placed my 22lb Westie on it, and it was not large enough nor quite stable enough for his size. I would defniitely recommend this for small dogs 15lbs and under.
customer_reviews.author: Floragem Scotties

customer_reviews.title: Arm not high enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice item only the grooming arm does not extend high enough for my lanyard to fit snug enough to keep dog in place. I'm looking for an extension to purchase but so far no luck.
customer_reviews.author: J. CABIRAC

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a very helpful device for grooming our 12 lb Havanese. We leave total grooming to professionals - we call it our girl's "spa day," but we use this to brush her between groomings to prevent snarls. Consider also using a dog brushing conditioner for routine brushings (lots of brands out there)
customer_reviews.author: SweetOldBill

customer_reviews.title: I love this grooming table
customer_reviews.text: I love this grooming table. I use it on a counter and my little dog doesn't blink an eye when I put her on it. Being able to rotate it helps immensely. Probably the only thing that I would like more is if the arm could extend just a little higher. Otherwise, this is a great product and works great.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLE
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, would like to see 2 inches added to diameter. Table does turn with dog on... but not smoothly. Plastic "disc" facilitates movement, don't know how W-D 40 would effect plastic... but do use clipper oil to lubricate
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Works as I'd hoped!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Not very big, so if you have a huge cat like we do....he sprawls out and falls over the edge. Works great and doesn't take much room to store.
customer_reviews.author: NStull

customer_reviews.title: The surface is slippery
customer_reviews.text: Surface is slippery thats why I took a star. I had to put a towel over the top to make it safe. It would be nice to have a rubber top so that the dogs wont slide.
customer_reviews.author: D Collins

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good, but bar doesnt go very high
customer_reviews.text: This a great little table, I just found the bar to not go high as I want it to. The straps that come with it dont do much with this short height. I've had to make adjustments to make it work for my toy poodle.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great price. Now all I have to do is practice a little more so my poor Yorkie doesn't look like a freak of nature after I take the clippers to her. Highly recommend this table. It's perfect for small dogs.
